name: 1.21 and 1.22: "Show Down" Parts 1 & 2 Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What two things did Diane say are wasted on the people at the bar?
questions.explanation:
culture and oxygen.

	Diane had always found herself to be intellectually superior to the others at the bar. While most of them sat around in a bar all day she had had 80 majors in college.

questions.text: How did Coach say Sam felt about his brother?
questions.explanation:
"He hates him."

	Sam always felt second best to his brother. He wanted nothing to do with his brother when his brother came to Cheers.

Derek.

	Derek was unseen and voiced by George Ball. Derek was the older brother of Sam Malone... older and more successful.

questions.text: What did Sam Malone's brother do for a living?
questions.explanation:
international lawyer.

	Sam was rather jealous of his older brother. In one scene he showed Diane a picture of Derek where he had blackened out some teeth.

questions.text: What did Sam say was "hard to get" for him?
options: taking a girl to the movies
questions.explanation:
sitting through dinner.

	Sam was used to always getting the woman he wants. When one said no to him he couldn't accept it.

questions.correct: Rich people cheating on their taxes
questions.explanation:
Rich people cheating on their taxes.

	Norm was an accountant and said that when rich people cheat on their taxes it affects everyone. He also said he put down the people in the bar as his dependents.

questions.text: Why didn't Coach get the job in Venezuela?
options: He didn't have a college degree.
questions.explanation:
They didn't like his English.

	Derek taught Coach Spanish in one night and he was hoping to get a job in Venezuela. However, when Coach applied for the job he didn't get it because of his English. Coach never went to college but that was not the reason he gave for not getting the job.

questions.text: Who was the first person Diane told about how she felt about Sam?
questions.explanation:
Coach.

	Diane realized she was attracted to Sam and that was why she didn't want to go away with Derek. However, she wanted commitment which Derek was offering her.

questions.text: When Sam asked, "Do I get to kiss the bride?", how did Diane respond?
questions.correct: "I think you know what you can kiss."
questions.explanation:
"I think you know what you can kiss."

	Sam still wouldn't admit he had feelings for Diane. She became annoyed and said she was going away with Derek. She said that they would eventually get married, prompting Sam to ask if he got to kiss the bride.

questions.text: Why did Diane say she wasn't with Derek?
questions.explanation:
She liked Sam better.

	Sam couldn't imagine why anyone would take him over his brother when his brother was so much better. Diane finally admitted how she felt about Sam and Sam said all the jealousy he felt for his brother no longer mattered.
